alert.note: Alert for South Central Elko County; Southeastern Elko County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 13 at 6:04PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...A cluster of thunderstorms will impact portions of east central Elko County through 645 PM PDT... At 602 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of thunderstorms over Oasis, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects, and make travel difficult for high profile vehicles along I-80. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... West Wendover, Oasis and Silver Zone Pass. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: South Central Elko County; Southeastern Elko County
